casebody.data:
Calvin SLOCUM, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE. No. 15-8187. Supreme Court of the United States March 21, 2016.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until April 11, 2016, within which to pay the docketing fees required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petitions in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
